subject: College Athletics
Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: With the start of the 2007 season, against Buffalo, less than 90 days away, Rutgers’s Greg Schiano may have finally put the 2006 season to bed.
snippet: With the start of the 2007 season, against Buffalo, less than 90 days away, Rutgers’s Greg Schiano may have finally put the 2006 season to bed.
